ComicInfo.Summary:
This is it! The world-shattering conclusion to the epic horror crossover event of the year! Will Jughead and Vampironica succeed in setting everything right between their respective realities- or will the army of blood suckers reign on Riverdale forever?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy, Bob Smith & Matt Herms | 1 | B | Cover B | David Mack | 2 | C | Cover C | Dan Panosian | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-04 12:36:23. [CVDB721623]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Joe Eisma, Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy
ComicInfo.Inker: Bob Smith, Joe Eisma, Joe Eisma, Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Bob Smith, Dan Panosian, David Mack, Matt Herms, Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Segura, Jamie Lee Rotante, Stephen Oswald, Vincent Lovallo
